Advanced data
NPC ID2665

Kragen is the farmer of the allotment patch south-east of Hemenster. He will watch after the player's allotments in exchange for certain items. The player receives four snowdrop seeds from Kragen as part of the Garden of Tranquillity quest.

Shop[edit | edit source]

Kragen also sells basic farming tools, which can be accessed by talking to him and asking Can you sell me something? It is not an actual shop and it has no set stock; each item must be bought individually through the dialogue.

ItemRestock
time		Price
sold at		GE

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
22 November 2018
(update)

Gardeners at farming patches now sell plant pots.

23 April 2015
(update)

Allotment farmers should once again be able to sell you farming supplies if you’ve completed Garden of Tranquillity.
